name: ElevenLabs
title: elevenlabs.io
shortDescription: ElevenLabs offers an AI dubbing tool that translates audio and video while preserving the original voices' emotion, timing, and tone. It supports 29 languages, making it ideal for content creators and businesses looking to expand their reach globally. Users can upload videos from various platforms, edit translations, and customize audio tracks to match their specific needs.
pros: Preserves original voice and style across languages
Supports video uploads from multiple platforms
Allows manual editing of transcripts and translations
cons: May require technical knowledge to fine-tune settings
Dependent on AI accuracy for voice matching
Limited to 29 languages which may not cover all user needs

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Descript
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers video editing and AI dubbing

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Wideo
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on video creation with voiceover tools

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Synthesia
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides AI video generation with voice synthesis
